name: Sterling Rope Velocity 9.8mm XEROS BiColor Dry Rope
description:
Balancing durability, weight and dry treatment, the Velocity is an all-arounder for almost any situation. It has a solid hand for easy clipping and a smooth, tight sheath for low drag through gear and over rock, with a low weight and impact force to take on any rock or ice project. The new XEROS dry technology is applied when the nylon is still a filament, treating the entire rope from core to sheath, and resulting in less waste and energy use than traditional treatments.XEROS permanent dry treatment is applied to nylon filaments before they're twisted into yarns. This results in less water absorption through the entire rope and prevents freezing in cold environments.Made with PFOA-free, PFAS-free, and bluesign® certified raw materials.Bi-colour pattern indicates middle mark to increase safety and speed on rappels.

        Sustainability
